--- title: "KIND network update" format: html editor_options: chunk_output_type: console execute: echo: false message: false --- ```{=html} ``` ## Week beginning Mon 18th November 2024 Dear colleagues, Welcome to our regular KIND network update. We've got a few R-themed events coming up this week, including our regular monthly R beginners club session. Hope to see you there if you're curious about R, a new R starter, or trying to build your R skills. Brendan --- ## Wins of The Week In the spirit of [#IAmRemarkable](https://www.rmrkblty.org/iamremarkable), we do a weekly wins of the week thread to celebrate the professional (and personal) achievements of the community. A random selection from last week: + Felt like I was plodding along this week, but looking back I've managed to get a couple of large pieces of work completed and am organised for next week so a success! + Been asked to go along to a group run by a colleague, to support some work they're doing and bring a different viewpoint. Chuffed at being asked and that my opinion is valued in a non-threatening but supportive way + I won an americano tournament in paddle ðŸŽŠ + Finally managed to complete and submit the practical component of my GA coursework assignment. --- ## Training sessions `````{=html}
Session Date Area Level
HTML for non-web developers 13:00-15:00 Wed 20th November 2024 Skills ðŸŒ¶ :beginner-level
````` ## Events - 3-4pm, Mon 18th November 2024. [All welcome at the Community Meetup - our regular Monday get-together/webinar/tech demo](https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ab03b2fd777e440eaa255ba67569762b5%40thread.tacv2/1723028114046?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%2210efe0bd-a030-4bca-809c-b5e6745e499a%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%225d92fd7e-56b9-4892-ab77-84ad75c260a0%22%7d). Full details and joining links via the [community meetup channel](https://teams.microsoft.com/l/channel/19%3Ab03b2fd777e440eaa255ba67569762b5%40thread.tacv2/Community%20meetups?groupId=106d08f3-9026-40e2-b3c7-87cd87304d58&tenantId=10efe0bd-a030-4bca-809c-b5e6745e499a). The theme this week is **using SQL in R**. We'll be looking at some beginner-friendly ways of starting to use SQL databases as a tool for managing data in R. - NES's Knowledge Services team are re-running their excellent and highly-regarded series of short events about research and publication next week. [Full details and registration links](https://forms.office.com/pages/responsepage.aspx?id=veDvEDCgykuAnLXmdF5JmmWL8edIO_5Cmgr6wY5txHZURFJFWDA5NFlKWk1CTVFORlAwTlNKUEs0NSQlQCN0PWcu&route=shorturl) - Our monthly [R beginner's club is running Thursday 14th November 3-4pm](https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/ap/t-59584e83/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fteams.microsoft.com%2Fl%2Fmeetup-join%2F19%253ab03b2fd777e440eaa255ba67569762b5%2540thread.tacv2%2F1725260923641%3Fcontext%3D%257b%2522Tid%2522%253a%252210efe0bd-a030-4bca-809c-b5e6745e499a%2522%252c%2522Oid%2522%253a%25225d92fd7e-56b9-4892-ab77-84ad75c260a0%2522%257d&data=05%7C02%7Cbrendan.clarke2%40nhs.scot%7C934c89b524d343a846f608dccb1e163e%7C10efe0bda0304bca809cb5e6745e499a%7C0%7C0%7C638608577294901657%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=a8NkAIelwuWbNW9aSQ74DujKcNzit%2BoH7XvY348RYHQ%3D&reserved=0). A group session for R beginners to review their code, get unstuck, and pick up some tips and tricks. More experienced R programmers are absolutely welcome too, but this session is focused on those new to (or returning to) R code. All welcome, especially if you're brand new to R or are coming from our R from Scratch course. ## Book of the week character(0). character(0). *character(0)*.
ISBN character(0), Worldcat.
